that closet south of Tony's room, but...
-------------------------------------------------[Map:1:4:0:43]

since before I started working here!

-------------------------------------------------[Map:1:4:0:45]
\ignr\nm[Boy]\face[BoyOpenMouth]\fr

-------------------------------------------------[Map:1:4:0:46]

unfortunately I could not say.

Panky
Kisaburo
Danielle
See ya later.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:1:4:0:54]

someone is having a bad day, he'll give
them ice cream.

in order to freeze the cream. Genius!

remember me because I'm the only
girl in my grade with a pink mohawk!

\ignr\nm[Boy]\face[BoyHappy1]\fr
Whoa, cool!

\ignr\nm[Cora]\face[Cora]\fr
Anyways, it was nice meeting ya! 
-------------------------------------------------[Map:1:5:0:14]
\ignr\nm[Boy]\face[BoyHappy3]\fr

\ignr\nm[Cora]\face[CoraTalk]\fr

together to do something special for the 
people on our floor here in the hospital!

talk to me!

\ignr\nm[Boy]\face[BoyHappy3]\fr
Okay!
-------------------------------------------------[Map:1:5:0:19]
\ignr\nm[Cora]\face[CoraConfused]\fr

they have to stay here... 
-------------------------------------------------[Map:1:5:0:20]
\ignr\nm[Cora]\face[CoraTalk]\fr
But here's the way I see it...
-------------------------------------------------[Map:1:5:0:21]
No one knows how much time they have
in this world. My time could be up in 80
years...
-------------------------------------------------[Map:1:5:0:22]
\ignr\nm[Cora]\face[CoraGrin]\fr
...or 8 minutes!
-------------------------------------------------[Map:1:5:0:23]
\ignr\nm[Boy]\face[BoySurprised2]\fr

-------------------------------------------------[Map:1:5:0:24]
\ignr\nm[Cora]\face[Cora]\fr
Point is, I'm gonna do everything I can to 
make good use of my time. Time's precious
you know!
-------------------------------------------------[Map:1:5:0:25]
If I could help just one person here to feel
happier, then it'd all be worth it.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:1:5:0:26]
\ignr\nm[Boy]\face[Boy]\fr
...
-------------------------------------------------[Map:1:5:0:31]
\ignr\nm[Cora]\face[Cora]\fr
Sometimes I like to look for spare
change around the hospital.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:1:5:0:32]
\ignr\nm[Cora]\face[CoraGrin]\fr
You'd be surprised how much is
just laying around in cabinets and
drawers!
-------------------------------------------------[Map:1:5:0:38]
\ignr\nm[Cora]\face[Cora]\fr
I'm just working on my new painting...
-------------------------------------------------[Map:1:5:0:39]
\ignr\nm[Cora]\face[CoraTalk]\fr
How do you like my cat?
-------------------------------------------------[Map:1:5:0:40]
\ignr\nm[Cora]\face[CoraGrin]\fr
I gave her pink fur, heh heh.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:1:5:0:47]
\ignr\nm[Cora]\face[Cora]\fr
Dude yeah! Chef Panky came out here
earlier and he was NOT happy.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:1:5:0:48]
\ignr\nm[Cora]\face[CoraTalk]\fr
I guess the thief took a lot of food
from the cafeteria kitchen.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:1:5:0:49]
\ignr\nm[Cora]\face[CoraConfused]\fr
How the heck did they get into the 
kitchen? 
-------------------------------------------------[Map:1:5:0:50]
You can't even get there from the
cafeteria... 
-------------------------------------------------[Map:1:5:0:51]

\iBelieve me, I've tried!

\ignr\nm[Cora]\face[Cora]\fr

Tony
Sue
Jacky

Who is Winston?
Where would you go?
That's cool.

out by the river.

He's a nice guy, but he mainly keeps 
to himself.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:17:28:0:7]

since he came to the Forest... we don't
really know what happened to her.

WOULDN'T I go.

-------------------------------------------------[Map:28:5:3:2]
\ignr\nm[Kazuko]\face[Kazuko]\fr
Welcome to the Midnight Tea Shop!
-------------------------------------------------[Map:28:5:3:4]
\ignr\nm[Kazuko]\face[Kazuko]\fr
How can I help you today?
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++[Map:28:5:3:5]
What's up?
What is this place?
See ya!
-------------------------------------------------[Map:28:5:3:7]
\ignr\nm[Kazuko]\face[Kazuko]\fr
Times have been tough, but I'm going 
to try my best every day. 
-------------------------------------------------[Map:28:5:3:8]
\ignr\nm[Kazuko]\face[Kazuko]\fr
We have a saying in the world of tea...
"One time, one meeting."
-------------------------------------------------[Map:28:5:3:9]
\ignr\nm[Kazuko]\face[Kazuko]\fr
Basically, this could be the first and last
time we ever meet. The first and last
chance. The first and last moment...
-------------------------------------------------[Map:28:5:3:10]
\ignr\nm[Kazuko]\face[Kazuko]\fr
So let's make it the best it can be.
-------------------------------------------------[Map:28:5:3:14]
\ignr\nm[Kazuko]\face[Kazuko]\fr
We serve all sorts of teas here, as well
as homemade food. We even sell tea
in bulk!
-------------------------------------------------[Map:28:5:3:15]
I grow all the tea myself in the plantation
out back... I love gardening, I feel at home
when I'm surrounded by plants and nature.

\ignr\nm[]\face[]
Once upon a time, there lived a Boy in a faraway 
land called Morizora's Forest.\w[80]
-------------------------------------------------[Map:186:2:0:26]
\ignr\nm[]\face[]
Even though he was still quite young, the Boy
was considered a great warrior by his tribe.\w[60]
-------------------------------------------------[Map:186:2:0:29]
\ignr\nm[]\face[]
One day, the Boy returned home from a hunt to 
find that everyone in his tribe...\w[80]
-------------------------------------------------[Map:186:2:0:32]
\ignr\nm[]\face[]
...had disappeared.\w[20]
-------------------------------------------------[Map:186:2:0:33]
\ignr\nm[]\face[]
At first, the Boy was very afraid.\w[20]
-------------------------------------------------[Map:186:2:0:36]
\ignr\nm[]\face[]
But he soon learned that his tribe had escaped 
danger by sailing to a world called Rakuen.\w[60]
-------------------------------------------------[Map:186:2:0:39]
\ignr\nm[]\face[]
In order to reach them, the Boy decided to seek 
help from the great Guardian of the Forest... 
Morizora.\w[30] 
-------------------------------------------------[Map:186:2:0:40]
\ignr\nm[]\face[]
For it has been said that Morizora would grant  
one wish to anyone who was able to complete  
his challenges.\w[100]
-------------------------------------------------[Map:186:2:0:43]
\ignr\nm[]\face[]
Thus, the Boy set off on a great journey.\w[30]
-------------------------------------------------[Map:186:2:0:44]
He fought evil spirits... visited many lands...\w[30]
-------------------------------------------------[Map:186:2:0:47]
\ignr\nm[]\face[]
And befriended even the most severe of 
creatures!\w[70]
-------------------------------------------------[Map:186:2:0:50]
\ignr\nm[]\face[]
And at long last, Morizora granted the Boy his 
wish:\w[40]
-------------------------------------------------[Map:186:2:0:51]
A ride on his magical boat.\w[40]
-------------------------------------------------[Map:186:2:0:52]
The Boy was now able to sail away, finally 
reuniting with his tribe and all those he 
loved...\w[40]
-------------------------------------------------[Map:186:2:0:53]
In the beautiful world...\w[10]
-------------------------------------------------[Map:186:2:0:56]
\ignr\nm[]\face[]
...of Rakuen.\w[50]
-------------------------------------------------[Map:186:2:0:66]
\ignr\nm[Mom]\face[Mom]\fr
Goodnight.\w[80]

SKILLS
################################################################
_______________________________________________________[Skill:1]
---Boy's Skills---

_______________________________________________________[Skill:3]
Cross Cut
Special sword technique.
_______________________________________________________[Skill:4]
Watersphere
Deals water damage to one enemy.
_______________________________________________________[Skill:5]
Flying Blades
Special sword technique.
_______________________________________________________[Skill:6]
Swordsmanship
A powerful sword attack.
_______________________________________________________[Skill:7]
Leeble Mischief
Makes an enemy laugh so hard that they take damage over time.
_______________________________________________________[Skill:8]
Dance of the Dragon
A powerful sword attack that damages all enemies.
______________________________________________________[Skill:13]
---Mom's Skills---

______________________________________________________[Skill:15]
Luna
Channels moonlight to damage one enemy.
______________________________________________________[Skill:16]
Heal
Heals one ally.
______________________________________________________[Skill:17]
Lullaby
Sings an enemy to sleep.
______________________________________________________[Skill:18]
Bash
Staff attack.
______________________________________________________[Skill:19]
Group Heal
Heals all allies.
______________________________________________________[Skill:20]
Swift
A strong staff attack.
______________________________________________________[Skill:21]
Cry of the Forest
Channel the power of the forest to damage all enemies.
______________________________________________________[Skill:25]
---Enemy Skills---

______________________________________________________[Skill:27]
Group Heal
Heals all allies.
______________________________________________________[Skill:28]
Coconut Bomb
A lightweight bomb that targets a single enemy.
______________________________________________________[Skill:29]
Destruction
Deals damage to all enemies.
______________________________________________________[Skill:30]
Earth Toss
Throws pieces of earth at the enemy.
______________________________________________________[Skill:32]
Darkness
Deals Dark damage to one enemy.
______________________________________________________[Skill:33]
Fear
Causes the enemy to cower in fear for a turn.
______________________________________________________[Skill:34]
Lava Ball

______________________________________________________[Skill:35]
Lava Wave

______________________________________________________[Skill:36]
Icicle

______________________________________________________[Skill:37]
Frozen Sleep
Causes one enemy to fall asleep due to a sudden drop in temperature.
______________________________________________________[Skill:40]
Summon Mush Babies

______________________________________________________[Skill:41]
Summon Mush Babies

______________________________________________________[Skill:42]
Sleep Spores
Releases spores that induce sleep.

A sturdy sword carved from cherrywood.
______________________________________________________[Weapon:5]
Nightstone Sword
A sword made of the dark stone around Leeble Village.
______________________________________________________[Weapon:6]
